column2: df.raw_binom[df.raw_binom == "A few times per year or less"] <- "Rare"
plot.5yr_yes_binom <- ggplot(df.raw_binom %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.3", names(df.raw_binom))) %>% filter(Q2.3 == "Yes") %>% gather(statement, response, 2:5), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.5yr_no_binom <- ggplot(df.raw_binom %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.3", names(df.raw_binom))) %>% filter(Q2.3 == "No") %>% gather(statement, response, 2:5), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
ggarrange(plot.5yr_yes_binom, plot.5yr_no_binom, ncol = 2, common.legend = TRUE, legend = "top")
